_header: Hey how the mavis on a briar
Subjects: chansons d’aventure; dialogues, lovers’; birds, as narrators
_description: A chanson d’aventure dialogue between a mavis and a disconsolate lover — three 10-line tail-rhyme stanzas

BLAdd5665.First Lines: Hay how the mavys on a brere…
